snippet: Though not on the payroll, spouses and nephews are among those available to residents, at a cost, sometimes to everyone’s benefit, and sometimes not.
abstract: The Appraisal column notes that although not on the payroll, spouses and nephews of New York City building staff members sometimes work in ancillary roles, offered up by as a way to cater to demanding tenants’ needs; says such 'discrete ecosystems exist in every New York City apartment building, and although rife with potential pitfalls, are often an easy way to keep residents happy.
lead_paragraph: Though not on the payroll, spouses and nephews are among those available to residents, at a cost, sometimes to everyone’s benefit, and sometimes not.

headline.main: Need Condo Cleaned? Consider the Superintendent’s Family
headline.print_headline: Need Condo Cleaned? Consider the Superintendent’s Family
